title: New website with free fonts!
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new website!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**WWW.TIPOTYPE.COM**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033/http:/www.tipotype.com/)

[![TipoType](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033im_/http:/tipotype.com/rufina/imagenes/slide3.png "TipoType")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033/http:/www.tipotype.com/)

DOWNLOAD OUT OUR FREE FONTS:

[![TipoType](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Fenix_TipoType.jpg "TipoType")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033/http:/tipotype.com/fenix/)

[![TipoType](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/gafata11-920x460.jpg "TipoType")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033/http:/tipotype.com/gafata/)

Thanks for the support  
 [**TipoType.com**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204033/http:/www.tipotype.com/)
